title.rendered: CM Airlines Head Office: Ticket Booking and Fleet

content.rendered:
CM Airlines is a domestic airline in Honduras. According to the airline “CM” stands for “Cielo Maya” (Mayan sky).

 

Verified & Updated on: 11/03/21

Toncontin International Airport

CM Airlines Address :  Edificio Ingesa Tegucigalpa, Honduras

Phone : 2290-1800, 2290-1835

Miami, FL U.S.A.

Phone : (646) 309-5485, (305) 938-0521

Email : info@cmairlines.com, freight@cmairlines.com, starmiles@cmairlines.com, feedback@cmairlines.com

CM Airlines Official website : https://www.cmairlines.com/en/

Types of Planes / Air craft available with CM Airlines

  • Saab 340
  • Embraer EMB 110 Bandeirante
  • Let 410

CM Airlines Baggage Allowance

CM Airlines Baggage Allowance

View CM Airlines Hand | Cabin baggage, Checked baggage, Excess baggage charges, over weight baggage charges, over size baggage charges in the above link.

CM Airlines Special Assistance Services :

Travelling while pregnant in CM Airlines :

Expectant mother can not travel in CM Airlines beyond 28 weeks of pregnancy .

For more details visit : https://www.cmairlines.com/en/travel-info/specials-needs

Queries handled by CM Airlines Customer care:

Schedule, eBooking, Rescheduling, Track and Trace, Charter Service Queries, Trucking service Queries, e-claims Flight Information, Missing Luggage, Delayed Flights. Pharma, pets, valuable, perishable goods and extra care shipment queries.

Is there any problem / complaint with reaching the CM Airlines, Honduras Address or Phone number? Please report any issues using the below comment form.

Rate your experience with the CM Airlines, Honduras : (click on the stars below)
